Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Danny M
Reviews.Content: Very easy to mount and great clarity. The only thing which is not a huge deal for me is the screws for adjusting the camera bracket strips easily , so you just have to be careful.

Reviews.Title: BAD ADJUSTMENT OPTIONS
Reviews.Author: Jaya Green
Reviews.Content: GOod quality video....crappiest adjustment options ever (ive bought 6 different swann models)....come on Swann durrr. this camera isnt cheap either.

Reviews.Title: Swann Pro-530 is a good buy
Reviews.Author: Tiger51
Reviews.Content: I bought and installed 6 of these cameras along with a Swann DVR. I like them and think they are a really good buy.  The usable night range is probably closer to 30 feet but if you have night lighting all is well. All in all, these cameras do the job pretty well.

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: Liza Jane
Reviews.Content: least expensive replacement camera available. appeared to be in new condition as advertized. works well. fortunate to have such a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Appears to be great quality
Reviews.Author: GBTB
Reviews.Content: Havent installed this camera yet.  It appears to be in great shape.  It is a refurb model and it will be installed in an easy to access location just in case it doesn't operate as it should.

Reviews.Title: Swann camera
Reviews.Author: Chris Benson
Reviews.Content: Great replacement part for original unit where one camera was failing.  Actually works better at night as it has more IR LEDs for clearer picture than original unit.

Reviews.Title: I didn't get a knob to adjust the camera mount like shown on the picture!!!!
Reviews.Author: Dinh Van
Reviews.Content: Image quality is okay, but the mounting of the camera is awful. I had to get a little screw driver to loosen the mount and it was a hassle to get a perfect angle.

ProductInfo.Name: Swann SWPRO-530CAM Pro-530 Day/Night 600 TVl Camera (Black)
